bibl.bibl: Melvill, James Cosmo. 1864. The flora of Harrow. With notices of the birds of the neighbourhood, by the Hon. F. C. Bridgeman, and the Hon. G. O. M. Bridgeman, and of the butterflies and moths, by C. C. Parr and E. Heathfield. London: Longman, Green, Longman, Roberts, and Green. Harrow: Crossley and Clarke.
